title.bibl: Lietuva, Dec. 15, 1911. Theater Performance for the Benefit of the Prisoners in Russia

div.bibl: Lietuva, Dec. 15, 1911. THEATER PERFORMANCE FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PRISONERS IN RUSSIA

body.p: The Lithuanian Theatrical and Drama Society, Ruta, will present a four-act comedy, "Stupid George," by Zemkalnis, December 17 at Hull House Hall. [The performance] will begin at 8 P.M. Admission, 25, 35 and 50 cents.
The profit will be sent to the prisoners in Russia, who are imprisoned there for trying to enlighten the people by distributing books and literature to them.
